section.title: RichFaces 3.2.0 with MyFaces 1.2.2 on WebLogic 10 MP1
Description
section.para: If you try to use RichFaces 3.2.0 with MyFaces 1.2.2 on a WebLogic 10 MP1 server the following error appears:
section.programlisting: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Servlet response already use stream, Writer not possible ...
section.para: The same project works on Tomcat 6.016, Tomcat 5.5.25 WebLogic 10MP1 with RichFaces 3.1.4.

section.title: How to reproduce
section.para: The problem occurs if the environment mentioned above is set.

section.title: Causes
section.para: Unknown. Possible problem with MyFaces on WebLogic 10MP1.

section.title: Workarounds
section.para: Switching to JSF-RI 1.2_07 fixes the problem (see forum post)
